author: IGN
description:
Take a peek at The Forsaken Temple in this latest Warhammer: Vermintide 2 trailer. The Forsaken Temple is the first level of the three-part adventure, Verminous Dreams. The Heroes embark on a new adventure to investigate a mysterious elven Temple. Something malevolent is happening at the Temple, and it’s up to you to uncover the truth. The Forsaken temple free update is available now on all platforms, with parts two and three set to release in 2025. Additionally, the first update to Versus arrives in Warhammer: Vermintide 2 on PC on December 17, bringing a new playable boss: the Rat Ogre. Created by piecing together multiple Skaven, the Rat Ogre uses raw force to overcome its opponents.

#IGN #Gaming #Warhammer
title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Verminous Dreams: The Forsaken Temple - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Indiana Jones has arrived, and it’s a game-changer for Xbox! Join us as we dive into why this epic adventure might just be the best Xbox exclusive in years. From its thrilling gameplay to its unique take on first-person mechanics, we break down everything that makes Indiana Jones stand out in the Xbox lineup.

#IGN #Gaming #Xbox
title: Indiana Jones and The Great Circle Brings Back the Magic of Xbox Exclusives - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description: Check out the LEGO Fortnite Brick Life trailer for this new social roleplay experience in the LEGO Fortnite universe. Make new friends, explore the sights, land your dream job, and move into your new home when LEGO Brick Life launches on December 12, 2024.
title: LEGO Fortnite: Brick Life - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description: LEGO Fortnite is becoming LEGO Fortnite Odyssey. Check out the LEGO Fortnite Odyssey trailer to see what's coming with the Storm Chasers update for LEGO Fortnite Odyssey, which brings a new biome, dungeons, enemies, items, and a formidable big bad: the Storm King. LEGO Fortnite Odyssey's Storm Chasers update will be available on December 10, 2024.
title: LEGO Fortnite Odyssey - Official Storm Chasers Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Atomic Heart trailer to see action-packed gameplay, hordes of enemies you'll fight, and more from the Enchantment Under the Sea DLC. The Enchantment Under the Sea DLC for Atomic Heart brings new weapons, glove capabilities, and more. Atomic Heart: Enchantment Under the Sea DLC will be available on January 28, 2024.

In Atomic Heart: Enchantment Under the Sea DLC, search for answers in the depths of the 3826 Facility. Meet new and returning characters and dive into the underwater Neptune Research Center to explore its mysteries and find a way to save humanity from a dismal future.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Atomic Heart: Enchantment Under the Sea - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Every stylist in Miraland has a Pear-Pal, which functions as Infinity Nikki's main menu to access your backpack, quests, outfits, sketches, and more. Infinity Nikki players get their own Pear-Pal at the beginning of the game, but navigating these menus can be overwhelming. This Infinity Nikki guide breaks down every Pear-Pal menu and how to unlock more Pear-Pal features.

00:00 Intro
00:39 Wardrobe
01:08 Sketches
01:26 Resonance
02:06 Store
02:35 Courses
03:17 Evolution
03:51 Run, Pear-Pal
04:14 Compendium
04:56 Mira Level
05:17 Friends
05:50 Quests
06:05 Daily Wishes
06:39 Tutorials
06:57 Mira Journey
07:36 Backpack
08:03 Momo's Album
08:22 Folklore Guide
08:49 Factions
09:34 Eureka
10:08 Glow Up
10:36 Dig, Pear-Pal
11:13 Mira Crown
12:03 More Infinity Nikki tips!

For more Infinity Nikki tips, check out our full Wiki guide and interactive map at https://www.ign.com/wikis/infinity-nikki

#IGN #Gaming
title: Infinity Nikki: What Do All the Menu Options Mean? | Pear-Pal Explained

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Marvel Rivals x Marvel Cinematic Universe collaboration trailer for the reveal that you can experience the Marvel Cinematic Universe with your favorite Super Hero costumes in this superhero team-based PVP shooter game. Marvel Rivals is available now on PC (Steam and Epic Games Store), PS5, and Xbox Series X/S.

#IGN #Gaming #MarvelRivals
title: Marvel Rivals x Marvel Cinematic Universe - Official MCU Skins Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss our exclusive Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 tips from the developers themselves! The 15th century Kingdom of Bohemia was a dangerous place to be, and the upcoming medieval sandbox, Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 is no different! From understanding how to balance your stamina during a sword fight, to not being afraid of wearing that historically authentic heavy armor, and finding a particular saddled buddy of yours from the original Kingdom Come: Deliverance, and more, here are eight developer tips for surviving within the equally beautiful and dangerous year of 1403.

The Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 release date is February 4, 2025, for Xbox Series X/S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and PC.

Stick with IGN for the rest of December as we'll have plenty more from Kingdom Come: Deliverance II, including interviews with the Warhorse Studios devs, KCD2 gameplay features, and more.

#KingdomComeDeliverance2 #Gaming #Games
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - 8 Developer Tips for Surviving | IGN First

author: IGN
description:
Academy Award-winning director Christopher Nolan’s landmark epic Interstellar celebrates its 10th anniversary this year and Paramount Pictures is marking the occasion with a 10th Anniversary IMAX Exclusive Limited Engagement on December 6, 2024, with tickets going on sale November 7.  In addition, a Collector’s Edition 4K Ultra HD set will arrive on December 10, 2024.

Enjoy this exclusive look at the new bonus featurette "The Future Is Now: A Look Back at Interstellar." Explore the impact of Interstellar 10 years later through new interviews with director/co-writer Christopher Nolan, producer Emma Thomas, executive producer Kip Thorne, and co-writer Jonathan Nolan. From the development of prophetic black hole visuals to revolutionary production design for IMAX, further context is provided by colleagues and fans including director Peter Jackson (The Lord of the Rings) and director Denis Villeneuve (Dune).

Acclaimed for its scientific accuracy, Interstellar captured viewers’ imaginat
title: Interstellar 10th Anniversary: Exclusive Behind the Scenes Clip - Christopher Nolan, Kip Thorne

author: IGN
description:
Become the blade that destroys demons. Check out the Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 trailer to meet the characters from this upcoming sequel to the 2021 action game. Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Steam, and Nintendo Switch in 2025.

#Gaming #DemonSlayer #HinokamiChronicles
title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the latest featurette for Ballerina unveiled at CCXP 2024 that shows a behind-the-scenes look with the cast and crew on the training, shooting, and development of the next installment of the John Wick franchise. Hear from the film's producer Chad Stahelski, director Len Wiseman, and the late and great Lance Reddick on Ballerina's production.

Taking place during the events of John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum, Ballerina follows Eve Macarro (Ana de Armas) who is beginning her training in the assassin traditions of the Ruska Roma.

Ballerina stars Ana de Armas, Anjelica Huston, Gabriel Byrne, Lance Reddick, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Norman Reedus, with Ian McShane, and Keanu Reeves. Ballerina is set in the world of John Wick.

Ballerina opens in theaters on June 6, 2025.

#Ballerina #Movies #JohnWick
title: Ballerina - Official Behind the Scenes (2025) Ana de Armas, Keanu Reeves | CCXP 2024

author: IGN
description:
Check out the first 27 minutes of Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind, a retro inspired beat em up staring the first generation of Power Rangers. Gameplay captured on a PS5 Pro at 4k 60fps.

#MightyMorphinPowerRangersRitasRewind #Gameplay #IGN
title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: Rita's Rewind | The First 27 Minutes of Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Watch The Bornless x Slipknot 25th Anniversary Tour trailer for the collaboration between the metal band and the upcoming action horror FPS game. The trailer gives us another look at the terrifying world of The Bornless, and this collaboration comes as Slipknot kicks off their EU tour this December 2024.

In The Bornless, face off against other players, summon demons, and build factions in a Lovecraftian world. Use Black Magick, acquire powerful weapons, upgrade your Safehouse, and strategize to survive. The Bornless will be available on PC.

#TheBornless #Slipknot #Gaming
title: The Bornless x Slipknot 25th Anniversary Tour - Official Teaser Trailer
